title: Estimated time for Triumphant Ryze Reward?
body: Hi I'm part of the team that won the Asus ROG gaming tournament in Freehold, NJ.  The 1st place prize was 1500RP for each team member and the triumphant ryze skin.  Nobody on my team has received any prizes yet and I'm wondering if this is expected? Did anyone from other areas receive their rewards yet?

replies.body: Depending on when this was, it might take a few moments to receive tournament prizes.  If it's been a while, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and see what happened.
